mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_NO ,B.NAME MSG_NO ,N.TITLE ,N.CONTENT ,N.COUNT ,N.ENROLL_DATE FROM MSG_NOTICE N JOIN MESSENGER M ON N.MSG_NO = M.MSG_NO JOIN MEMBER B ON M.NO = B.NO WHERE N.CHECK_DELETE = 'O' ORDER BY N.NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT N.NOTICE_NO ,B.NAME MSG_NO ,N.TITLE ,N.CONTENT ,N.COUNT ,N.ENROLL_DATE FROM MSG_NOTICE N JOIN MESSENGER M ON N.MSG_NO = M.MSG_NO JOIN MEMBER B ON M.NO = B.NO WHERE N.NOTICE_NO = #{no} AND N.CHECK_DELETE = 'O' ORDER BY N.NOTICE_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MSG_NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{no} AND CHECK_DELETE = 'O'
mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_NO ,B.NAME MSG_NO ,N.TITLE ,N.CONTENT ,N.COUNT ,N.ENROLL_DATE FROM MSG_NOTICE N JOIN MESSENGER M ON N.MSG_NO = M.MSG_NO JOIN MEMBER B ON M.NO = B.NO WHERE N.NOTICE_NO = #{no} AND N.CHECK_DELETE = 'O'

SELECT K.* FROM ( SELECT M.MSG_NO ,M.NO ,M.FILE_NAME ,M.INTRODUCE ,M.ENROLL_DATE ,B.NAME ,B.EMAIL ,B.ADDRESS ,B.PHONE ,B.ACCOUNT ,B.DEPT ,B.POSITION FROM MESSENGER M JOIN MEMBER B ON M.NO = B.NO ORDER BY MSG_NO DESC ) K WHERE K.NO=#{memberNo}
SELECT M.MSG_NO ,M.NO ,M.FILE_NAME ,M.INTRODUCE ,M.ENROLL_DATE ,B.NAME ,B.EMAIL ,B.ADDRESS ,B.PHONE ,B.ACCOUNT ,B.DEPT ,B.POSITION FROM MESSENGER M JOIN MEMBER B ON M.NO = B.NO ORDER BY MSG_NO DESC

SELECT T.NOTE_NO ,T.MSG_NO ,T.SEND_NAME ,T.RECEIVE_NO ,B.NAME RECEIVE_NAME ,T.TITLE ,T.CONTENT ,T.SEND_DATE ,T.RECEIVE_DATE ,T.FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT M.NOTE_NO ,M.MSG_NO ,M.RECEIVE_NO ,B.NAME SEND_NAME ,M.TITLE ,M.CONTENT ,M.SEND_DATE ,M.RECEIVE_DATE ,M.FILE_NAME FROM MSG_NOTE M JOIN MESSENGER G ON M.MSG_NO = G.MSG_NO JOIN MEMBER B ON G.NO = B.NO WHERE M.MSG_NO = #{msgNo} AND M.CHECK_DELETE = 'O' OR M.RECEIVE_NO = #{msgNo} AND M.CHECK_DELETE = 'O'
ORDER BY M.NOTE_NO DESC ) T JOIN MEMBER B ON T.RECEIVE_NO = B.NO

SELECT Y.* FROM( SELECT T.NOTE_NO ,T.MSG_NO ,T.SEND_NAME ,B.NAME RECEIVE_NAME ,T.RECEIVE_NO ,T.TITLE ,T.CONTENT ,T.SEND_DATE ,T.RECEIVE_DATE ,T.FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT M.NOTE_NO ,M.MSG_NO ,M.RECEIVE_NO ,B.NAME SEND_NAME ,M.TITLE ,M.CONTENT ,M.SEND_DATE ,M.RECEIVE_DATE ,M.FILE_NAME FROM MSG_NOTE M JOIN MESSENGER G ON M.MSG_NO = G.MSG_NO JOIN MEMBER B ON G.NO = B.NO WHERE M.MSG_NO = #{msgNo} AND M.CHECK_DELETE = 'O' OR M.RECEIVE_NO = #{msgNo} AND M.CHECK_DELETE = 'O'
ORDER BY M.NOTE_NO DESC ) T JOIN MEMBER B ON T.RECEIVE_NO = B.NO ) Y
WHERE SEND_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE RECEIVE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
